com.gazbert.patterns.behavioural.state

Class BugTrackerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gazbert.patterns.behavioural.state.BugTrackerContext

  • public class BugTrackerContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The context for a *very* simple bug tracker. The example shows how the State pattern can be used for keeping tabs on the cost of the work being done to fix the bug as it travels through the various departments.

    All the different states are listed here.

    This class controls the state transitions and always 'knows' the current state.

    Author:
    gazbert

      • BugTrackerContext

        public BugTrackerContext()
        Constructor initialises the state context.

        It creates all the state objects and passes the context into each one.

        It sets the initial state.
